sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { CurrencyDollarIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon, ShoppingBagIcon, ClockIcon, } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [dashboardData, setDashboardData] = useState({ todaysSales: 0, lowStockItems: [], topProducts: [], recentTransactions: [], loading: true }); useEffect(() => { // Simulate loading dashboard data const loadDashboardData = async () => { try { // This would be replaced with actual API calls setTimeout(() => { setDashboardData({ todaysSales: 1247.50, lowStockItems: [ { id: 1, name: 'Coca-Cola 20oz', currentStock: 2, threshold: 12 }, { id: 2, name: 'Marlboro Red', currentStock: 4, threshold: 5 }, { id: 3, name: 'Red Bull 8.4oz', currentStock: 1, threshold: 6 }, ], topProducts: [ { id: 1, name: 'Coca-Cola 20oz', sales: 45 }, { id: 2, name: 'Lays Chips Classic', sales: 32 }, { id: 3, name: 'Snickers Bar', sales: 28 }, { id: 4, name: 'Water 16.9oz', sales: 25 }, { id: 5, name: 'Pepsi 20oz', sales: 22 }, ], recentTransactions: [ { id: 1, number: 'TXN-20241201-003', amount: 14.09, time: '2 hours ago' }, { id: 2, number: 'TXN-20241201-002', amount: 5.42, time: '3 hours ago' }, { id: 3, number: 'TXN-20241201-001', amount: 8.12, time: '4 hours ago' }, ], loading: false }); }, 1000); } catch (error) { console.error('Error loading dashboard data:', error); setDashboardData(prev => ({ ...prev, loading: false })); } }; loadDashboardData(); }, []); if (dashboardData.loading) { return (
); } return (

Dashboard

Welcome back, {user?.username}! Here's what's happening today.

{/* Stats Grid */}
Today's Sales
${dashboardData.todaysSales.toFixed(2)}
Low Stock Alerts
{dashboardData.lowStockItems.length}
Transactions Today
{dashboardData.recentTransactions.length + 127}
Avg. Transaction
$9.52
{/* Content Grid */}
{/* Low Stock Alerts */}

Low Stock Alerts

{dashboardData.lowStockItems.map((item) => (

{item.name}

Stock: {item.currentStock} (Threshold: {item.threshold})

Low Stock
))}
{/* Top Products */}

Top 5 Products Today

{dashboardData.topProducts.map((product, index) => (
{index + 1}. {product.name}
{product.sales} sold
))}
{/* Recent Transactions */}

Recent Transactions

{dashboardData.recentTransactions.map((transaction) => ( ))}
Transaction # Amount Time
{transaction.number} ${transaction.amount.toFixed(2)} {transaction.time}
); }; export default Dashboard;
